gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Suns 128, Hawks 115
gameRecap.excerpt: The Suns defeated the Hawks, 128-115. Devin Booker led the Suns with 30 points and four rebounds as Eric Gordon (21 points, five assists) and Kevin Durant (19 points, four rebounds) added 40. Dejounte Murray (29 points, nine rebounds, 10 assists, four steals) and De’Andre Hunter (22 points) led the Hawks in the loss. Phoenix moves to 41-29 while Atlanta drops to 30-39.
